Chattanooga Food Trucks: 6 of the Best Bites on Wheels

    #food
Chattanooga is a special place for food lovers with its diverse range of food trucks offering unique dishes so there's something for everyone. For those looking to explore the local food truck scene, we've compiled a list of some great options. Whether you're a seasoned food truck enthusiast or a curious foodie, these trucks offer a variety of cuisines and experiences. Many of these businesses offer catering if you're interested. If we missed a truck you love, please reach out and we'll try to add it.

1.   California Smothered Burrito

Cuisine Type: Mexican
Location: Regularly found at the Chattanooga Market and various locations around the city. Schedule updates are typically posted on their social media. Their listed address is: 5612 Alabama Ave, Chattanooga, TN 37409
Menu Highlights: Smothered burritos, street tacos, and quesadillas. Known for their generous portions and flavorful sauces.
Price Range: $8 - $15
Contact Information:
  • Website
  • Phone: (615) 308-5417

2.   Rolling J's Mobile Bistro

Cuisine Type: Southern American
Location: Often found at the Chattanooga Market and various downtown locations. Check their website for the latest schedule.
Menu Highlights: Smoked Pulled Pork, Fish and Chips.
Price Range: $10 - $20
Contact Information:
  • Website
  • Phone: (423) 800-1282
  • Email: chef_@rollingjsmobilebistro.com

3.   Tacos El Tote

Cuisine Type: Mexican
Location: Typically found at the Chattanooga Market on Sundays, and at various downtown spots on weekdays.
Menu Highlights: Street tacos, burritos, quesadillas, known for their al pastor and carne asada.
Price Range: $5 - $15
Contact Information:
  • Instagram
  • Facebook

4.   Mama Yo's Soul Food

Cuisine Type: Soul Food
Location: Commonly found at the Chattanooga Market and various events. Schedule updates are posted on their social media. Address listed online: 3701 Alton Park Blvd, Chattanooga, TN 37410
Menu Highlights: Fried chicken, chicken wings, mac and cheese, collard greens.
Price Range: $8 - $18
Contact Information:
  • Facebook
  • Phone: (423) 635-8499

5.   Chatter Box Cafe

Cuisine Type: American Comfort Food
Location: Frequently found at the Chattanooga Market and various downtown spots. Schedule is regularly updated on their social media. Address listed online: 1108 W 33rd St, Chattanooga, TN 37410
Menu Highlights: Smoked wings, brisket, turkey and other bbq favorites.
Price Range: $7 - $20
Contact Information:
  • Website
  • Facebook

6.   Nonnis Empanadas

Cuisine Type: Latin American
Location: Located at 105 Porter St, Soddy-Daisy, TN 37379.
Menu Highlights: Beef empanadas, chicken empanadas, spinach and cheese empanadas, ham with cheese empanadas.
Price Range: $3.50 - $5
Contact Information:
  • Website
  • Facebook
